org_similarity_summary.insight_similar_orgs: Alterity, Verify, Nth Round, Slow Ventures, Irving Investors, and Morado Ventures are all involved in the technology industry. Verify specializes in identity and credentialing solutions, while Nth Round focuses on technology. Slow Ventures and Irving Investors invest in technology companies, with a focus on disruptive and high-growth opportunities. Morado Ventures specifically targets high-growth, seed-stage technology companies, particularly those with a "Data-fueled" focus.

overview_description.description: Alterity is a technology company with the soul of a growing business. They understand the challenges growing companies face – they are one – and they come to work every day with the goal of solving the issues that keep businesses from realizing all that is possible.
